settings.Heading: Hand Glove
settings.description:
• Cut & Tear Resistant Our high-protection gloves are ideal for working with machinery, equipment, and tools that require extra protection. Also ideal for working in cold environments and preventing injuries caused by slipping, grabbing, and reaching. Made of leather, neoprene, or other thick materials to provide extra protection, keep hands warm, and provide a better grip. Sizes range from small to extra-large so you can find the right fit.
  • Heat & Fire Resistant For protection against extreme heat and flames, our heat and fire resistant gloves are made with a combination of materials to provide maximum protection. Sometimes called tactical gloves or welding gloves, these are a go-to for working with dangerous machinery and equipment.
  • Anti-microbial & Food Safe Gloves designed with an anti-microbial coating that prevents the growth of bacteria and germs on your hands. They are suitable for use in the food industry safely.
  • Touch-Screen Compatible Stylish, light-weight, and flexible, our touch-screen compatible gloves are a great option for techies, builders, and other professionals who work with their hands a lot. They are also great for anyone who wants a little extra protection, or who is looking for a more fashionable option.
settings.description1:
• Water Proof Our water-proof gloves are ideal for those who work in harsh weather conditions. The material allows some moisture to pass through so you don't feel like your hands are completely sealed off, and they are a great choice for those who work in agriculture, construction, and other industries where their hands might get dirty.
  • Dipped Gloves For Added Flexibility Dipped gloves are made from a single layer of material that has been dipped in a rubber or vinyl compound. This makes the glove flexible and lightweight, which makes them ideal for a variety of jobs where dexterity is required.
  • Chemical Resistant Our chemical resistant gloves are designed to protect you from liquid chemicals, solvents, pesticides, and other hazardous substances.

settings.heading: Protective Eyewear Glasses & Goggles
settings.description:
• Suitable for both indoor and outdoor use Gives maximum visibility at optimal light levels.
  • UV Protection 99.9% protection against UV rays. Allows you to see better and clear in bright sunlight.
  • Dielectric Frames made with a non-conducting material, insulating against electricity.

settings.heading: Hearing Protection Ear Muffs & Ear Plugs
settings.description:
• Compact & Lightweight Necessary for day-long wearing, without putting too much strain on your ears
  • Different models to suit usage Foldable, behind the ears, cap mounted, and high visibility ear muffs for use in different environments.
